faq.question: How accurate are the AI answers?
faq.answer: 95%+ accuracy. AI extracts information directly from your document. Always includes page references so you can verify the source.

faq.question: Can I ask follow-up questions?
faq.answer: Yes! AI remembers conversation context. Ask follow-ups like 'Can you explain that in simpler terms?' or 'What else does the document say about this?'

faq.question: Does it work with technical documents?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Works great with legal, technical, scientific, and specialized documents. AI understands domain-specific terminology.

faq.question: Can I ask questions across multiple documents?
faq.answer: Yes! Pro and Team plans support multi-document Q&A. Ask 'Which document mentions warranty terms?' to search across all files.

faq.question: What if the answer isn't in the document?
faq.answer: AI will tell you 'I don't see that information in this document' rather than making up an answer. Honest and reliable.

faq.question: Is there a question limit?
faq.answer: Free: 5 documents/month with unlimited questions per document. Paid plans: More documents with unlimited questions. No per-question charges.
